metadata.name: Distance
metadata.description:
This is part of the "Distance" project that describes the relationship of an individual/idol and crowd/followers.

It was premiered at the New Music Festival in Katowice, later shown at many exhibitions and festivals (including the exhibition at the National Museum in Warsaw as part of the "The elevated: from the Pharaohs to Lady Gaga" exhibition.)

This photo was taken back in 2011, but it looks like it's getting more up-to-date every year.

size 4500x4500px
